file_content.text: Do not lose faith, my brothers!
For two tens of generations, we have kept our pledge. We will not emerge before the sign!
The Revan left us words to live by. There will be a sign! Someone will come, will seek the machine. Someone worthy.
Hold fast to your purpose, for that time will come. Your children will see that day, or their children, or a hundred generations hence!
Hold fast, for the day will come when we are tested, and we must be ready.
Will it be a worthy soul who breaches our defenses? Or must we kill and die to defend the Revan's legacy?
